No! It's Devo","country":"Worldwide","released":"2022-04-23","notes":"Record Store Day 2022 exclusive.
40th anniversary edition, first time as a picture disc in a PVC sleeve, unsealed.

Front cover of original album partially reproduced on translucent plastic so as to be like a frame, positioned in front of disc in sleeve.
Rear cover of original album reproduced on cardstock 12" insert positioned behind disc in sleeve.  No track times are given for this release.

Promotional sticker on sleeve
OH, YES!
IT'S A PICTURE DISC
Devo's Classic 1982 Album
> Includes <
"That's Good," "Peek-A-Boo"
& "Time Out For Fun"
Limited Edition of 5,500

"Record Store Day Exclusive" silver foil sticker on front of outer sleeve.
"Made In Canada" sticker on rear of outer sleeve of some copies.

© 1982 nymph music/devo music 
℗ & © 1982 warner records inc., a warner music group company.  Made in Canada.

release.notes:
Record Store Day 2022 exclusive.
40th anniversary edition, first time as a picture disc in a PVC sleeve, unsealed.

Front cover of original album partially reproduced on translucent plastic so as to be like a frame, positioned in front of disc in sleeve.
Rear cover of original album reproduced on cardstock 12" insert positioned behind disc in sleeve.  No track times are given for this release.

Promotional sticker on sleeve
OH, YES!
IT'S A PICTURE DISC
Devo's Classic 1982 Album
> Includes <
"That's Good," "Peek-A-Boo"
& "Time Out For Fun"
Limited Edition of 5,500

"Record Store Day Exclusive" silver foil sticker on front of outer sleeve.
"Made In Canada" sticker on rear of outer sleeve of some copies.

© 1982 nymph music/devo music 
℗ & © 1982 warner records inc., a warner music group company.  Made in Canada. 
rpd1 23741 / 603497842223
